name: DungeonTimeCrisisVR
description:
SteamVR only game!

Requirements:

  • Steam
  • SteamVR
  • SteamVR compatible VR gear (Vive, Oculus, Index)

How to play:

Use teleport to jump around.

Right hand trigger to shoot spells and right hand grap/grip to cast protection spell

Currently there is only starting town and guildhouse and within guildhouse there is training room
